item.visible: Addon.SettingBool(service.kodi_playlist_resumer,AddContextMenuItem) + [Window.IsVisible(videos) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, season)] + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + ![String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, plugin) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, addons) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath, sources)] + !String.IsEqual(ListItem.FolderPath, add)
